name: PFLAG San Francisco
description: Free family support meetings, education, and advocacy resources
fullDescription: PFLAG San Francisco provides support, education, and advocacy for LGBTQ+ individuals and their families, with regular support meetings and community resources.
whatTheyOffer:
- Monthly support group meetings
- Family support and education
- LGBTQ+ advocacy resources
- Speaker programs for schools/organizations
- Connection to local resources
- Virtual support options
howToGetIt:
1. Visit pflagsf.org for meeting schedule
2. Attend monthly support meetings
3. Contact for individual support
4. Request speakers for your organization
5. Access online resources
